law.catch_line: Implementation of county farm safety programs.
law.text: In order to educate the citizens of the Commonwealth on the significance and importance of farm safety, the department shall assist counties in implementing farm safety programs by making grants when funds are available to eligible county organizations to assist the organizations in promoting their farm safety programs.
law.history: Created 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 369, sec. 1, effective July 15, 1998.
